properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Deerfield Beach to Ocean Reef FL out 20 NM; Waters from Deerfield Beach to Ocean Reef FL from 20 to 60 NM excluding the territorial waters of Bahamas
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued February 1 at 1:41AM EST by NWS Miami FL
properties.description:
A Marine Weather Statement has been issued for the following areas...
Coastal waters from Deerfield Beach to Ocean Reef FL out 20 NM...
Waters from Deerfield Beach to Ocean Reef FL from 20 to 60 NM
excluding the territorial waters of Bahamas...

At 141 AM EST, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm, capable
of producing winds to around 30 knots. This thunderstorm was located
14 nm east of Hallandale, moving northeast at 20 knots.
properties.instruction:
Mariners can expect gusty winds to around 30 knots, locally higher
waves, and lightning strikes. Boaters should seek safe harbor
immediately until this storm passes.

Waterspouts are possible with this activity. Remain on the alert in
case warnings are issued for waterspout development.
